title: Single Person Perfect Studio in Beautiful Community!!
posting_body: ['Schedule Your Appointment Now!!!', 'In person and virtual tours!', '3900 Adeline has perfected the union of contemporary new age fashion and industrial artistry, to give you a home that stands alone without any of the additional amenities flair, centrally located in the heart of Emeryville, Enjoy lunch or Dinner with our onsite restaurant Monster Pho, grab breakfast at Hip Hop Juice Box, enjoy happy hour at Hometown heroes, you can take our free Emeryville shuttle anywhere in town –3900 Adeline is the epitome of perfected sanctuary living.', 'Conveniently nestled on the border of Emeryville and Oakland in the vibrant Longfellow neighborhood of Emeryville; we are just a 20 minute drive from the heart of San Francisco, and a 10 minute drive from Berkeley.', 'Our vibrant community allows for your life to be simplified as we are centrally located to virtually anything life requires.', 'Neighborhood...', '0.7 miles from MacArthur BART (9 minute walk)', 'Easy access to 24, 80, 580, 880, 980 freeways', 'Complimentary City-wide shuttle - Emery Go-round', 'Multiple grocery stores minutes away (Safeway -- 2 minute walk, Trader Joes -- 5 minute drive,', 'Sprouts -- 8 minute drive, Whole Foods -- 8 minute drive)', 'Monster Pho Restaurant within the community; Panera Bread and Starbucks just steps away', '12 Minute Drive or 25 Minute Bike Ride to University California Berkeley', 'Community Features. . .', 'Three unique community rooms, available for private events', 'Spacious patios on select units', 'Community lounge room with TV and wireless internet; full kitchen and ping pong table', 'Fully furnished lounge areas on each floor', 'Pet Friendly Community', 'Your home at 3900 Adeline Features. . .', 'Granite counter tops', 'Stainless steel appliances', 'Washer and Dryer in unit', 'Energy efficient windows', 'Gas cooktops and ovens', 'Microwave', 'Lots of natural light', 'Hard surface flooring', 'Complimentary High-speed internet access in community areas', 'Controlled access garage parking', 'Bike Storage', 'We look forward to hearing from you.', 'Stop by today to come and experience your new home!', 'Call Us -', 'show contact info', 'See Us - 3900 Adeline Street - Emeryville, CA 94608']
